form:FormGroup.label: Value Size
form:FormGroup.helpText: Choose how big a value can be for a data point. Larger values require more storage.

form:FormGroup.label: Store Latest Value
form:FormGroup.helpText: Should we store the last value received for the time period?

form:FormGroup.label: Store Min Value
form:FormGroup.helpText: Should we store the minimum value received for the time period?

form:FormGroup.label: Store Max Value
form:FormGroup.helpText: Should we store the maximum value received for the time period?

form:FormGroup.label: Store Count
form:FormGroup.helpText: Should we remember how many values we received for the time period? This is needed for calculating averages.

form:FormGroup.label: Store Sum
form:FormGroup.helpText: Should we store the sum of the values we received for the time period? This is needed for calculating averages.
